item.title: Beogram 4000: Keyboard Keys - Video About Removal and Installation
item.description:
After restoring a Beogram 4000, I shipped it to a customer, but two keypad keys came loose during transport. To secure them, I had used tape and foam, but the shipping stress was too much for the delicate leaf spring mechanism holding the keys. To prevent this from happening again, I created special tools that make it easier to install the keys and shared a video demonstrating their use. These tools, designed to avoid damaging the aluminum, are available to other enthusiasts...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-keyboard-keys-video-about-removal-and-installation/
